CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8)

PROJECT(expat)
INCLUDE_REGULAR_EXPRESSION("^(expat|xml|ascii|utf|name|iascii|latin).*$")

SET(expat_SRCS
  lib/xmlparse.c
  lib/xmltok.c
  lib/xmlrole.c
)

IF(WIN32)
  ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DCOMPILED_FROM_DSP)
ElSE (WIN32)
  IF(UNIX)
    CONFIGURE_FILE(${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/third_party/expat.src/expat_config.h.in
                   ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/third_party/expat.src/expat_config.h)
    ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DHAVE_EXPAT_CONFIG_H)
  ENDIF(UNIX)
  IF(APPLE)
    ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DMACOS_CLASSIC)
  ENDIF(APPLE)
ENDIF(WIN32)

ADD_LIBRARY(expat ${expat_SRCS})

IF(NOT EXPAT_INSTALL_NO_LIBRARIES)
  INSTALL(TARGETS expat
    RUNTIME DESTINATION bin COMPONENT RuntimeLibraries
    LIBRARY DESTINATION lib COMPONENT RuntimeLibraries
    ARCHIVE DESTINATION lib COMPONENT Development)
ENDIF(NOT EXPAT_INSTALL_NO_LIBRARIES)
